```{r EnzymeAbundancePlot1}

TEMP_EA <- sim_enz_dataframe %>% filter(sim_data_file == {{sim_data_file}}) %>% 
   unique()
Scenario <- paste(

   as.character(length(unique(TEMP_EA$Enzyme)) > 1), 
   # Num tissues
   as.character(length(unique(TEMP_EA$Tissue)) > 1))
```
